heading: We are branching out!
message: This company is branching out and reaching more cities - the next stop is Lund! If you would like to move to that company's building contact your teamleader who will contact the head-chief for more information. Right now in the beginning - the chance of easily changing locations are more likely to be approved - so do not pass up this fine opportunity!

heading: New cafeteria
message: We care about our people in this company and of all of ours well being. For everybody's comfort we have now a cafeteria! You can buy coffee, tea, hot chocolate and a various mix of different cookies. It is on the second floor - follow the signs and have a nice coffeebreak!

heading: We are hiring
message: This company is now hiring people from all sectors. If you want to change position or change careerpath inside the company - now is the time! Talk to your higher up and we will talk opportunities before we send out applications. We want to show that we trust you and want you to stay with us for as long as you wish - no matter what path you are on right now in life!
